text:
The AntClassLoader .getResource( .. ) generate a URL that start with 
file:C:/folder... The URL can not be converted to an URI as it is not 
considered to be an absolute path. The URL should be file:/C:/folder wich can 
be converted into an URI.
creator: jmlavoie@trisotech.com

text: should be fixed in CVS (three slashes between file: and C, BTW ;-).
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text:
Note: file:/C:/folder is actually preferred to file:///C:/folder (since the host
field is empty and can be omitted); at least acc. to the JRE, which accepts
either but generates the former in File.toURI (cf. bug #8031).
creator: jglick@apache.org
